Text: Anyone interested in such films as Threads, The Day After, and the TV series Jericho should see this film. I am making it one of my permanent uploads so if I am on-line this file will be seeded.

This download did not work for me. I am inclined to believe it is a fake file. If I am wrong I apologize to the uploader but I have run this file through several apps, including GSpot Codec information and it keeps coming up as unrecognizable. Very suspicious!
Yeah these guys are right, it doesn't work, AVIcodec could not recognize it either.    I would have liked to see this.
